DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare balloon angioplasty plus SBCV balloon angioplasty alone treatment stenosis within femoropopliteal artery .
DOC.brief_title: Angioplasty + SBCV vs. Angioplasty Alone Femoropopliteal Artery Stenosis
DOC.detailed_description: This first-in-human study evaluate safety effectiveness novel adjunctive therapy , SBCV , use balloon angioplasty compare balloon angioplasty plus control agent ( saline ) use treatment stenosis within femoropopliteal artery . Effectiveness measure late lumen loss 24 week post treatment evaluate independent , blind core lab .
